show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: Sarah D. Levesque and Anthony Corsaro - RFSI Forum September 2021
subtitle: Sarah D. Levesque and Anthony Corsaro - RFSI Forum September 2021
summary:
Sarah D. Levesque and Anthony Corsaro join us to share what the upcoming REGENERATIVE FOOD SYSTEMS INVESTMENT FORUM will look like.

The 3rd annual RFSI Forum is back in person this year in Oakland, California. Don’t miss out on the one event exclusively for the investors in our space on September 28-29 for amazing sessions, speakers, and networking.
If you use the code KOEN-15 until September 17th you get 15% to register go to: rfsi-forum.com

Many of the podcast interviewees will be there from Dan Kittredge to Mark Lewis, from Esther Park to Eric Smith!
For the full agenda, speakers and more visit https://rfsi-forum.com/current-forum/

Support the show
